__e: Come on, Mr. Open Book, you told me yourself that the only thing that you want in this life is to have a family.
I hope you didn't tell him that I am here.
I'm sorry I didn't tell you and Mom I was gay sooner.
But you should have told me about the woman.
Is there anything you haven't told me about the night Tom died?
Look, Pete, I should have told you about us. But you should know I'm crazy about her.
You should have told me about the baby.
I'm just wondering why you never told me about what happened to your mom?
I'm sorry I didn't tell you about the world.
She's saying I never should have told you about her.
I'm just wondering why you never told me about what happened to your mom?
I mean, I just kind of wish that he'd told me about this earlier, you know. That I'd known it was going on, maybe I could've helped.
No... but I guess that's why I should've come clean before.
Why I couldn't tell you the truth.
I should have told you the truth. And I'm sorry I didn't.
Look, I wasn't to know you hadn't told him.
Hey, that's awesome that you told him who you are and he's cool with it.
I should have told him about you, but the thing is, my dad, he's... he's tricky.
If I had it to do over again, I still wouldn't have told her.
And the fact that he didn't tell you he's about to go to prison is all the information you need to know about this boy.
And so the thing about this story was that actually I had only told the part about myself.
I know I should have told you before, but... I suppose the reason I didn't was bec... because I knew he wouldn't want anyone to know.
Look, i've spent 12 years learning this business.
Uh,sorry,mom,but I-I found this, and I know I probably should've told you earlier.
Actually, I'm glad that you shared that, because here's a tidbit for you:
You look like the good news is i've got two days to live, And the bad news is you were supposed to tell me yesterday.
And I know that I should've told you this sooner, but it was just never the right time, and then it... it got away from me.
I'm sure he's already told my mother, which means everyone will instantly know that she knows.
She won't have told anyone she has it.
There is something I should have told you guys a long time ago...
